item.title: VIM Notes
item.author: cyrusncy@gmail.com (CyrusN)
item.description: VIM Basic amix/vimrc: The ultimate Vim configuration: vimrc Vim Cheat Sheet - English VimGenius vimgifs Some useful skills Update VIM Pathogen Plugin for i in ~/.vim/bundle/*; do git -C $i pull; done Insert across multi-lines Select the lines you want to modify using Ctrl-v. Press: I: Insert before what’s selected. A: Append after what’s selected. c: Replace what’s selected. Type the new text. Press Esc to apply the changes to all selected lines.
